Title: Priory of the Sacred Flame
Description:
Good to see you, $n. I have a job just for you.

Sister Etna Blayze of the Arathi is convinced that something is wrong within the Sacred Flame Priory. She did not expand on the matter at hand.

Please head out to the Priory of the Sacred Flame and join the sister. A stomach pebble tells me she might be right and will need your help.
ObjectivesText: Biergoth wants you to go to the Priory of the Sacred Flame and help Sister Etna Blayze.
CompletionText: I am not sure if you are still here or already back.

Objectives.Text: Help Sister Etna Blayze fight the Priory
